org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering

Class FuzzyCMeansDistributedClusterer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering.BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer<SparseDistributedMatrix>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering.FuzzyCMeansDistributedClusterer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clusterer<SparseDistributedMatrix,FuzzyCMeansModel>

    public class FuzzyCMeansDistributedClusterer
extends BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer<SparseDistributedMatrix>
    This class implements distributed version of Fuzzy C-Means clusterization of equal-weighted points.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering.BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer

    • Constructor Detail

      • FuzzyCMeansDistributedClusterer

        public FuzzyCMeansDistributedClusterer(DistanceMeasure measure,
                                       double exponentialWeight,
                                       BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer.StopCondition stopCond,
                                       double maxDelta,
                                       int cMeansMaxIterations,
                                       Long seed,
                                       int initSteps,
                                       int kMeansMaxIterations)
        Constructor that retains all required parameters.
        Parameters:
        measure - Distance measure.
        exponentialWeight - Specific constant which is used in calculating of membership matrix.
        stopCond - Flag that tells when algorithm should stop.
        maxDelta - The maximum distance between old and new centers or maximum difference between new and old membership matrix elements for which algorithm must stop.
        cMeansMaxIterations - The maximum number of FCM iterations.
        seed - Seed for random numbers generator.
        initSteps - Number of steps of primary centers selection (the more steps, the more candidates).
        kMeansMaxIterations - The maximum number of K-Means iteration in primary centers selection.

    • Method Detail

      • cluster

        public FuzzyCMeansModel cluster(SparseDistributedMatrix points,
                                int k)
                         throws MathIllegalArgumentException,
                                ConvergenceException
        Perform a cluster analysis on the given set of points.
        Specified by:
        cluster in interface Clusterer<SparseDistributedMatrix,FuzzyCMeansModel>
        Specified by:
        cluster in class BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer<SparseDistributedMatrix>
        Parameters:
        points - The set of points.
        k - Clusters count.
        Returns:
        A list of clusters.
        Throws:
        MathIllegalArgumentException - If points are null or the number of data points is not compatible with this clusterer.
        ConvergenceException - If the algorithm has not yet converged after the maximum number of iterations has been exceeded.

      • weightCenters

        public ConcurrentHashMap<Integer,Integer> weightCenters(String cacheName,
                                                        UUID uuid,
                                                        List<Vector> centers)
        Weight each center with number of points for which this center is the nearest.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Cache name of the point matrix.
        uuid - Uuid of the point matrix.
        centers - The list of centers.
        Returns:
        Hash map with weights.
